title: McDonald's Big Mac sauce is coming back for a limited time only
text:
McDonald's Australia has announced it has bottled up its iconic Big Mac Special Sauce for customers to enjoy at home - but for a limited time.

The condiment, which is considered one of the tastiest in the world, is priced at $12 for a 500mL bottle and will go on sale today at restaurants nationwide.

All proceeds from sales of the Special Sauce will be donated to Ronald McDonald House Charities (RMDC).

'We know that Big Mac Special Sauce has a loyal following, and we're excited to bring back bottles of this Aussie favourite for our customers for a limited time,' said Jo Feeney, Director of Marketing at McDonald's Australia.

Fans of McDonald's Big Mac Special Sauce will be able to purchase a bottle of the condiment from restaurants nationwide from today

McDonald's is bottling the sauce as a way to raise funds for Ronald McDonald House Charities

Big Mac Special Sauce is available from McDonald's for $12 for a 500mL bottle

As well as launching the sauce as a way to help raise funds for RMHC, the burger outlet will be holding its national McHappy Day, Saturday 16 November.

Each year, all McDonald's restaurants across Australia host McHappy Day, a fundraiser that supports the charitable work of the organisation.

'McHappy Day is instrumental in raising funds for the charity, which helps keep families together while their seriously ill child undergoes treatment,' reads a statement about the fundraiser.

'Since its inception in Australia in 1991, McHappy Day has raised more than $46 million for RMHC.

How can you make McDonald's Special Sauce at home? Ingredients: 1/2 cup mayonnaise 2 tablespoons classic yellow mustard (Dijon) 4 teaspoons sweet pickle relish 1 teaspoon white vinegar 1 teaspoon onion powder 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1 teaspoon paprika 1/8 teaspoon salt Method: Stir to combine and refrigerate overnight Source: McDonald's Canada via YouTube

Supermarket versions of the sauce include one by Woolworths, priced at $2.50 (pictured left) and another by Coles, priced at $2.75 (pictured right)

While McDonald's special sauce may only be available for a limited time, this doesn't mean you need to go without the flavoursome addition if you're a fan.

Woolworths has created a version of the burger condiment which is priced at $2.50 for a 330mL bottle.

According to the ingredient list, it contains Canola Oil, Water, Sugar, vinegar, gherkin, eggs, salt, Dijon Mustard and onion powder.

Coles also has a variation on the sauce. It's Special Burger Sauce is priced at $2.75 for a 360g bottle.
description: McDonald's Australia has announced its special sauce, loved the world over, will be available for customers to consume at home. It's set to go on sale from today and is priced at $12 a bottle.
authors: Emilia Mazza For Daily Mail Australia
